name: Carrion Emissaries
shortDescription: The Carrion Emissaries are flesh-smiths and bone-chirurgeons, harvesting divine remnants and stitching themselves anew. They do not worship relics â€” they repurpose them. Their grotesque forms and living weaponry are testaments to evolution through desecration, and they view war as a way to grow stronger, stranger, more sacredly wrong.
description: The Carrion Emissaries are death-worshippers who believe in the sanctity of decay. Their warriors are wrapped in preserved flesh and bone, and they carry relics that can drain the life from their enemies to fuel their own unnatural existence.
